scripts.test-manual: rimraf test && mkdir -p test && yarn test:all

scripts.test:js:karma: cd test && ../app.js js-karma Test 'test' n karma y y && cd js-karma && yarn prepare && yarn test
scripts.test:ts:jest: cd test && ../app.js ts-jest Test 'test' y jest y y && cd ts-jest && yarn prepare && yarn test
